title: Portfolio Website (Reat & Tailwind css)
description: Modern and responsive portfolio website, built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring a minimalist design and a great user experience.

title: HexFrogger
description: Contributed to a C-based tool to hexdump files and see strings in the dump.

title: C-Project to imitate an art gallery
description: A console-based project C-based that simulates an art gallery management system. The application allows users to register new works of art, list all artworks, update artwork details, and search for specific pieces.

title: Python game
description: A simple game developed in Py as an academic project, focused on game mechanics, collision handling, and object interaction.

title: CTF (Capture The Flag) Challenges
description: CTF project created by Capit√£oSapinhas for a class at EBSQF, with my participation in its development. The project was designed as an introduction to cybersecurity concepts for regular students, using accessible and educational challenges.

title: Winner of ACM & xSTF - CTF 2025
description: Participated as part of a team that won the ACM & xSTF CTF 2025, a cybersecurity competition held at FEUP - Faculdade de Engenharia da Universidade do Porto, solving challenges in web and osint.
